title: OpenTofu vs. HashiCorp Takes Center Stage at Open Source Summit
author: Alex Williams
description: Jim Zemlin, head of The Linux Foundation, took up for OpenTofu's fight against code theft allegations in the event's opening keynote.
cntitle: OpenTofu 与 HashiCorp 在开源峰会上占据中心舞台
cndescription: Linux 基金会负责人吉姆·泽姆林在活动开场主题演讲中支持 OpenTofu 对抗代码盗窃指控的斗争。
